title: Cannabis In Germany - Legalize, Don't Decriminalize
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Talking cannabis legalization in Germany with Niklas Kouparanis, CEO and Co-Founder of Bloomwell Group - one of Germany’s largest cannabis companies. We talk about legalizing the whole value chain. The mistake of decriminalizing before legalizing. Learning the lessons from already legal markets.
content:encoded: Talking cannabis legalization in Germany with Niklas Kouparanis, CEO and Co-Founder of Bloomwell Group - one of Germany’s largest cannabis companies. We talk about legalizing the whole value chain. The mistake of decriminalizing before legalizing. Learning the lessons from already legal markets.
